issue.title: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7469](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7469). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Improve some operations in bit_util:

1. Eliminate one division for CeilDiv
2. Avoid overflow for RoundUp
3. Add a utility for CeilDiv(value, 8)
